entry.title: Pioneer V2570170-2XL - Flame Resistant Pullover Style Heavyweight Cotton Hoodie V2570170-2XL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pioneer
Type: Pullovers
Price: 122.67

[shortdesc]

Flame Resistant Pullover Style Heavyweight Cotton Hoodie

  • 100% FR treated preshrunk cotton, 12 oz (400 GSM)
  • Material and all components meet CGSB 155.20-2017
  • Thermal Protective Performance (TPP) value: 11.6 cal/cm²
  • Meets ASTM F1506-10a, NFPA 70E and CSA Z462-15
  • ATPV 23 cal/cm² (Arc Thermal Protective Value)
  • ARC 2 Arc Rating Category
  • Sewn with inherently FR thread
  • Liberal sizing
  • Tough double-stitched seams
